The authors did not mention this method for discussions in the manuscript. The RPWBA method in the manuscript should be compared with the previous rDWBA theory. At least the authors should mention the differences of the two methods and how far the RPWBA can be compared to rDWBA?

The authors did not mention these experimental works in the manuscript. It would be nice if the RPWBA method in the manuscript can be compared with the experiments.
